SELECT OPRAT_CODE /*운행코드*/, TO_CHAR(TCKT_TM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS TCKT_TM /*승차일자*/, TRAIN_NO /*열차번호*/, TRAIN_KND_VALUE /*열차종류 값*/, START_STATN_VALUE /*출발역 값*/, ARVL_STATN_VALUE /*도착역 값*/, TO_CHAR(START_TM, 'HH24:MI') AS START_TM /*출발시각*/, TO_CHAR(ARVL_TM, 'HH24:MI') AS ARVL_TM /*도착시각*/, NVL(PRTCLR_SEAT_Y_CO, '0') AS PRTCLR_SEAT_Y_CO /*특실 좌석수*/, NVL(PRTCLR_ROOM_Y_CO, '0') AS PRTCLR_ROOM_Y_CO /*예약된 특실 좌석수*/, NVL(PRTCLR_SEAT_N_CO, '0') AS PRTCLR_SEAT_N_CO /*일반실 좌석수*/, NVL(PRTCLR_ROOM_N_CO, '0') AS PRTCLR_ROOM_N_CO /*예약된 일반실 좌석수*/ FROM TABLE( PK_ADMIN_RCRD.FN_SLT_TCKT_RCRD( #trainKndCode,mode=IN#, #tcktTm,mode=IN# ) ) ORDER BY START_TM DESC
/******************************************************************* * 이름 : FN_SLT_TCKT_RCRD * 설명 : 승차권 발권 현황 * 파라미터: 열차종류코드, 승차일자 ******************************************************************/
